author: Adi Robertson
title: FBI arrests man for hawking fake ‘coronavirus prevention pill’
description: The FBI has arrested California man Keith Lawrence Middlebrook for selling a fake “coronavirus prevention pill” and a treatment for COVID-19. He is charged with attempted wire fraud.
content:
He also allegedly claimed to work with Magic Johnson
Photo by Srdjan Stevanovic / Getty Images
The Justice Department arrested a California man for hawking a fake COVID-19 cure, marking the first federal criminal case tied to the novel coronavirus. Keith La… [+2359 chars]
